#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
typedef long long ll;
#define F(i,a,b) for(ll i=a;i<=b;i++)
#define ITR(x,c) for(__typeof(c.begin()) x=c.begin();x!=c.end();x++)
#define ALL(a) (a.begin()),(a.end())
#define ZERO(a) memset(a,0,sizeof(a))
#define mp make_pair
#define pb push_back 
#define X first
#define Y second
#define pi 3.14159265
#define MOD 1000000007  

int main(){
	
	ll t;
	
	scanf("%lld",&t);
	
	while(t--)
	{
		string k,n;
		
		cin>>k>>n;		
		
		ll len=k.length();
		
		int i=0,j=0;
		
		while(i<len && j<len-1)
		{
			if(k[i]==n[j])
			{
				i++;
				j++;	
			}
			else i++;

		}
		
		if(j==len-1)
		printf("1\n");
		else printf("0\n");
			
	}

	return 0;
}
